name: Sweet Tooth (itch) (laothomas01, Areebia, Stormblessed)
description:
(Use full screen if healthbar is not visible)
A human trial teleportation accident has left the earth infected by the sweetness of candy. Venture as specimen 24601 to uncover the destruction left behind and stop the machine from converting the rest of the universe into candy. Use your arm-turned candy as a phaser by shooting melted candy at the candified creatures coming at you. Be wise as you use part of yourself each time you shoot!

Controls:

MoveA and DJumpSpaceShootMouse Right ClickAim
Mouse Cursor
Skip Intro
Space

Credits:

Programmers: Thomas Lao/ Umair Khalid

Artists: Audrey Clair Dayrit/ Kelly Lee

Manager: Kishore Vegiraju

Producer: Areeb Yaqub
